name: Twisted Turban
description:
This turban is a super cozy ear-warmer and a great way to stay warm without the bulk of a hat. It looks great with an up-do or your hair down. It is stretchy and easy to get off and on with out having to worry about a button. It comes in a variety of colors. Currently solid colors are the only option and variegated colors will be listed as READY TO SHIP when they are available. If you have a special request please contact me and I will do what I can do get you taken care of. 
Enjoy!

name: Braided Boot Cuffs
description:
These boot cuffs are a great way to add a pop of color and warmth to an outfit without the bulk of a full sock. 

These are very stretchy but if you are concerned about size please include your calf measurements. 

They can be made in any color. For colors that match everything consider oatmeal or grey marble. MORE PICTURES COMING SOON!! 

Turn around time is currently 1-2 weeks. If you are needing something sooner please shoot us an email at Oikoshandmade@gmail.com to discuss possibilities. 
PATTERN BY BONITA PATTERNS

name: Graycee Kate Booties
description:
Miss Graycee Kate needed some new shoes that she would keep on so her momma sent me a picture and asked if these could be done. I told her they certainly could and the Graycee Kates were born! I so adore this little girl!! These crocodile stitch booties are such a fun statement for the little ladies in your life. They come in every color you can imagine and can be buttoned at any stitch location making for a tight fit every time. The oatmeal color pictured goes with EVERYTHING and is currently the biggest hit. 
Sizes are 
0-6 months
6-12 months
Toddler 
Coming soon - adult 

Pattern by Bonita Patterns http://bonitapatterns.com

name: Granny Square Coffee Cozy
description:
Why use those ugly cardboard cozies when you could have a stylish Granny Square cozy?! 
These work just like the ugly cardboard sleeves but give you a chance to show your style and love for handmade. 
I can make them to fit a to go coffee cup or a coffee mug. Color options are endless so shoot us a message so I can create a special one of a kind coffee cozy for you. 
These make great teacher gifts, Christmas gifts, or a Just because gift for yourself, friend, or family member. Enjoy! 

If you order more than 3 enter coupon code: Granny15    and receive 15% off.
If you order 5 or more receive a free cozy…no coupon needed.

name: Fleur De Lis Graph (2 Graphs)
description:
Playin’ Hooky Designs and Oikos Handmade have joined forces to create this amazing beanie. We have perfected this pattern along with 4 full pages of photo tutorials to help you learn how to crochet from a graph. It’s fun to make and comfortable to wear. And with limitless possibilities for images, you can make one for everyone and they won’t be the same.

Here’s how it works:

Get this base beanie pattern and one free graph to get you started 
The Base Beanie is $5.00 with a free graph inform us in the note to seller which graph you would like us to send.

Learn how to work from a graph, create an almost invisible seam, adjust the size to fit anyone, and how to insert the graph into your hat 
Choose from the other graph patterns offered by me or Playin' Hooky Designs to grow your collection

Each of my graphs is tested by me to make sure they will look good on a beanie. I won’t sell a graph without first testing it.

More graphs are being added all the time, so be sure to check back!

You have permission to sell finished items made from my patterns! If you sell online, please link back to my shop: 
Original Design by Liz from Playin’ Hooky Designs & Kimberly from Oikos Handmade

Pattern is written in standard US crochet terms. I offer free customer help after every pattern purchase. Please email me or send me a message with your questions.

Don’t be fooled by imitations. This is the original Graph Beanie!

name: Side Tab Mini Slouch Hat
description:
This crochet hat is done in 100% cotton unless otherwise stated. It isn't to baggy and gives just the right amount of slouch. There is a button detail on the side of the hat that I believe gives the hat added character. We have many buttons to choose from so contact us if you would like to see pictures. This hat is a unisex hat (depending on the button) that is perfect for children and adults. Follow us on Facebook or Instagram to get a preview of the hats as we work on them or contact us to customize a hat just for you. *Prices of the hat can vary due to the button added* 

Pictures coming soon of hat on men as well as Ready to Ship hats so keep checking back. Enjoy! 

Pattern is by Selena Baca with Baca Creations

name: Oklahoma Clutch
description: The Oklahoma Clutch is a great way to show your pride for our great State. You can show your pride for your favorite college town, our local NBA team or just choose your favorite colors. Each clutch comes fully lined and either has button(s) or a zipper closure. These can be made to accommodate your electronic devices as well (for anything bigger than a Ipad mini or kindle Fire please message us for prices). You can add a lighting bolt or heart to the inside of the state if you would like to as well. If you have any questions please let us know.

options.name: Small Oklahoma Clutch w/ zipper/zipper pull
Medium Color Blocked Oklahoma Clutch with zipper

name: Aztec Clutch
description:
Aztec prints are very every where you look this season. So we wanted to translate that into crochet and this is what we have come up with. These clutches come with a zipper or button closure and a fabric liner. These clutches are big enough to carry your IPad Mini, your kindle, Nook, or just your every day necessities. 

We currently have one ready to ship. They are photographed next to the fabric that is inside the clutch.
1) Grey Aztec clutch with coral, poppy, and copper. This clutch has a button closure. 

This can be made as a custom request. So please contact us if you have questions or a color scheme in mind. Check back as we will be adding at least one more in the next two days that will be Ready to ship. Enjoy!

options.name: Aztec Clutch with Zipper and Zipper Pull

name: Lace Peter Pan Collar
description:
Peter Pan Collars are a great way to dress up a simple t-shirt, tank, v-neck, dress, or even a cardigan. 
These collars are detachable but we can sew them onto onesies or shirts for your young children if you would like (contact us for more information). The collars come in size toddler, child, and adult. The colors are 100% customizable so contact us if you have a certain color in mind. 
Picture 2 & 3 show the collars that are ready to ship. 
Picture 2 is adult size
Picture 3 is toddler size 

Have a look around and let us know if we can help you with anything. Enjoy! 
Made by Tommie

name: Mustache Cowl
description:
What a fun way to keep warm. These are great for toddlers all the way up to adult size. They can be done in any color(s) and look great on the misses as well as the misters. If you're not into mustaches we could also do a bowtie. 
If you have questions please let us know, Enjoy!

name: Cable Scarf
description:
This cable scarf is perfect for cold days. It is nice and warm without all of the bulk. It is worked up with a soft bulky yarn and adorned with 2 buttons. The buttons will vary on each scarf as no two are done the same. The scarf can be done in a variety of colors and the majority of them can be seen on facebook. If you have a color in mind contact us to discuss the possibility of getting a certain color as we want to find the perfect color for you. This scarf can also be done in two tone/color blocking. 
Thank you for looking around, Enjoy!

name: Superhero Hats
description:
This listing is for a completed superhero hat. We currently can do Batman, Superman and Captain America. We have a few others in the works so if you don't see the hero you need...let us know. 
Please select the size type from the drop down box when ordering. 
Also let us know if you want the hat to be with or without the pom pom. Also these hats can be made slouchy if you would like. 
Enjoy! 

                        Baby to 6 months –    Height 5” Length 13”
			6 months to 1 year –  Height 6” Length 17”
                        Toddler  -                  Height 7” Length 18”
	       	        Child 3-10 years –     Height 8” Length 19”
		        Teenager –                 Height 9” Length 21”
			 Adult Woman –         Height  9” Length 22”
                         Adult Man –              Height 9 ½”  Length 23 ½”

name: Graph Beanie Base Pattern and Additional Graphs
description:
Playin’ Hooky Designs and Oikos Handmade have joined forces to create this amazing beanie. We have perfected this pattern along with 4 full pages of photo tutorials to help you learn how to crochet from a graph. It’s fun to make and comfortable to wear. And with limitless possibilities for images, you can make one for everyone and they won’t be the same.

Here’s how it works:

    Get this base beanie pattern and one free graph to get you started
The Base Beanie is $5.00 with a free graph inform us in the note to seller which graph you would like us to send. 

    Learn how to work from a graph, create an almost invisible seam, adjust the size to fit anyone, and how to insert the graph into your hat
    Choose from the other graph patterns offered by me or Playin' Hooky Designs to grow your collection

Each of my graphs is tested by me to make sure they will look good on a beanie. I won’t sell a graph without first testing it.

More graphs are being added all the time, so be sure to check back!

Deer Graph 
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=475343592520250&set=pb.151241711597108.-2207520000.1364190335&type=3&theater

options.name: Graph Beanie Base Pattern plus your choice of Graph

name: Crochet Turban
description:
Turban ear warmers are a fun and funky way to keep your ears warm this fall/winter. They can also be made thinner to wear as a headband. Such a fun and retro accessory. The colors are 100% customizable. I was inspired by the Turban I purchased from RaynaJaye (http://www.etsy.com/shop/RaynaJaye). We also have a turban hat that will be listed after Christmas. If you would like to look at it before check out our Facebook page. 

We have many colors on hand so if you are look for a specific color let us know. Also the ones pictured in the last photo are all Ready to Ship. If you have questions please let us know. The color options are endless! 



The stitch was changed to this current one after seeing it in the book Crochet Boutique by Rachel Oglesby.

options.name: Mustard Yellow Turban - Ready to Ship

name: Cinch Scarf
description: This scarf has become a personal favorite of mine. Pom Pom’s seem to be a very in trend right now and this is a great way to add them to your wardrobe. This scarf comes in a variety of colors. It can be color blocked, striped, or pick a solid color and do multi colored pom pom’s. It can hang loose and then you can cinch it up for it to hug your neck.

name: Thunder Hat
description: Living in Oklahoma the OKC Thunder have become a pretty big deal. After sketching a few different designs I came up with this Thunder inspired hat. It can be made in any colors you choose so if you want them to go with the alternate jerseys we can make that happen. Also we can do the number of your favorite player if you aren’t a fan of the lighting bolt. Also check out our FB page to see our Superhero hats. If you have any questions please let us know.

options.name: Thunder hat with Lighting Bolt & Pom Pom

name: Mom Tattoo Hat
description: This "mom" hat is perfect for the special little lad in your life. This hat can be made in a slouch version or a beanie version. We can also make it in girly colors and add dad instead of mom. The colors options are endless and 100% customizable. If you have any questions please be sure to let us know. Enjoy!

options.name: Make it a slouch hat (make sure to add the regular hat to your cart first)

name: DeAnn Ear-warmer
description: This ear warmer is stretchy, simple, stylish, comfortable and keeps you feeling cozy during the cool/cold months ahead. The ear-warmer can be made with or without a matching flower. The solid color options are endless and then we will throw in a few pattern options options along the way. The first picture of my sister, Tommie DeAnn, is made with a patterned peacock yarn. The second is of a custom OSU ear-warmer. Contact us for any questions or to customize yours today. Also visit our Facebook page and hit "LIKE" to keep up with the new colors, options and other products. Enjoy!

name: Aspen Cowl
description:
FREE SHIPPING THIS WEEK ONLY ENDS SUNDAY 8/12/12!
The Aspen cowl is a perfect accessory for fall and winter. The ribbed stitch makes is very stretchy. This cowl can be worn several different ways. You can wear it long, twist and wrap once, wrap over your head like a hood or button it anywhere and stuff the remaining tail into your loop. The buttons are made from Aspen branches from our trip to Creede, CO. Visit our facebook page to see more pictures of the Aspen cowl being worn. 
There are currently 7 that are ready to ship and the colors are listed and pictured. 
These cowls can be done in any color(s) if you don't see what you are looking for please contact us at oikoshandmade@gmail.com. Enjoy!

name: Granny Square Cowl
description:
This granny square cowl is one of our new items for fall/winter. This cowl is 4 to 5 granny squares stitched together seamlessly allowing for it to look good from all angles. It is light weight and warm, perfect for both fall and winter. We can customize it to fit your color needs. I

I am a huge fan of granny squares right now, I love how they feel timeless and effortless. We have a granny square clutch, a granny square ring in the shop…so I figured we needed a cowl and an ear-warmer (it is in the works) for the fall and winter months. Another thing I like about the granny square it has a very vintage feel and the color options are truly endless. Visit us on facebook to see more color options.  Enjoy!

name: Granny Square Clutch
description: This little clutch is made using 4 granny squares, zipper and then is lined with fabric. These are perfect when you aren't wanting to carry your purse or are already carrying a diaper bag. I can fit my wallet, cellphone, inhaler, pen, a couple of hair accessories and my keys. The color options are endless so contact us to make it just like you want it. For more information check out our FB or http://www.oikoshandmade.com/?p=643.

name: Bertie Mae (Granny Square Hat)
description: This hat is a granny square slouch hat made up of 4 granny squares and a granny circle on top. This hat can me done in as many colors you would like or do a single color for a simple statement. You can read more about Bertie Mae here..http://www.oikoshandmade.com/?p=513. Contact us today to design your very own Bertie Mae.

name: Diane Hat
description: This hat was made for my dad's cousin who is currently battling Chemo. This hat is very stretchy and warm. It can be made in any color and a flower can be added as well. The variegated yarn is a specialty yarn and is also fair trade. For more information on this hat visit our website.

name: The Nathan Hat
description: These hats were made for our families favorite Country Crooner....Nathan Burris. These hats are perfect for both summer and winter. This style is a very breathable hat! This hat is like the hats Zac Brown wears. The color options are endless and have plenty of stretch to them. The ones shown are a grey fleck with a brick red band, solid black, and an oatmeal fleck with a green band. You can choose two colors, stripes, or a solid color. Perfect for the whole family.

name: Sophia Hat
description: This hat is an open weave hat. It can be made in any color combination or would look very classy done in all one color. This hat would be the perfect spring/summer hat. Perfect for breezy days. This hat can be done in any color. Let us know how we can help you!
